articles.title: Woman dances to trending Bengali song Kacha Badam on the roadside. Viral video has 8 million views - India Today
articles.description: A video has surfaced on social media where a woman can be seen performing to the Bengali song Kacha Badam on the roadside. The video was shared by Bharti Hegde, a yoga instructor, and it has 8.2 million views so far.
